title: Investing in Water: Focus on Infrastructure and the Mega-Drought
description: MarketWatch's Rachel Koning Beals interviews ALINE Wealth's CIO and founder Peter Klein about how to smartly invest in water. Congress could provide $55 billion to upgrade water infrastructure, but it may not be enough for this critical resource.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
